metadata.title: CVE-2023-5349 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leak flaw was found in ruby-magick, an interface between Ruby andImageMagick. This issue can lead to a denial of service (DOS) by memoryexhaustion.

criterions.comment: ruby-rmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
